char_select.evillocked_message: Unlock the Chased and Escaped achievement to unlock this robot!
char_select.greenlocked_message: Unlock the Golden Achievement to unlock this robot!
char_select.ironlocked_message: Unlock the Zenith of Six Achievement to unlock this robot!

settings.login_instr1: Enter your username and the password for your account.
settings.login_instr2: If the account does not exist, a new account will be created for you.
settings.login_instr3: Press TAB to switch between inputting Password and Username. To return, press ESC.
settings.case_warning: Usernames and Passwords are case sensitive!

messages.confirm_quit: Are you sure you want to quit?

in_game.exit_message: Exit Portal! Come here to win!
in_game.mock_message: Wrong way my guy nothing special here...
in_game.jump_message: Use orange blocks to jump high distances!
in_game.key_message: Grab the coin and open the block!
in_game.invisible_message: These saws won't hurt you... promise!
in_game.portal_message: These blue portals teleport you! But to good places... mostly!
in_game.button1_message: Blue buttons, upon activation, will make you jump higher!
in_game.button2_message: Lavender buttons, upon activation, will make you jump lower!
in_game.clarify_message: Until you reach a checkpoint, of course!
in_game.clarify_message2: They also affect your jumps on jump blocks!
in_game.button3_message: Purple buttons, upon activation, will turn out almost all the lights!
in_game.button4_message: Green buttons, upon activation, will give you a massive speed boost!
in_game.timed_coin_message: Orange coins are timed! They open blocks for a limited
in_game.timed_coin_message_2: time. Run before they close again, or at worst, crush you...

in_game_ice.ice_message: Ice Blocks melt when you stand on them! But they also cool you down!
in_game_ice.freeze_message: But remember to get some warm ups and don't just freeze to death!
in_game_ice.overheat_message1: Also remember to keep track of your temperature and if
in_game_ice.overheat_message2: you heat up too much, stand on an ice block nearby!
